summary: Encapsulates a Yeelight smart bulb, providing access to its current state (on/off, brightness, color temperature, hue‑saturation, RGB, supported effects) and methods to modify those attributes such as setting brightness, color, effects, flash, mode, music mode, and updating the device.
business_intent: Enable applications and home‑automation platforms to monitor and control Yeelight lighting devices through a unified Python interface.
